response.overview: â€œIn Between Bones" is an evocative project made in Brooklyn, NY during Winter of 2022. Directed, shot, and processed by Ingridi Viruel, and featuring Luana Seu. The project delves deep into the tumultuous landscape of human emotions, presenting a raw and unfiltered portrayal of the intricate dance between despair and happiness, love and anger. Through its narrative, "In Between Bones" reflects the philosophical chaos that resides within us all. It examines the spectrum of feelings that define our existence, imposing confrontation with the intensity of our own emotions. The project posits that in the intricate weave of life, no feeling is insignificant or unworthy of expression. Ultimately, "In Between Bones" delivers a poignant message: no feelings should ever be repressed. This project stands as a testament to the power of emotional honesty and the beauty found in the chaos of human experience.  Special thanks to Ruby Gauchman, Mono No Aware Film
response.title: IN BETWEEN BONES
